identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a modern, transparent, and luxurious jewellery discovery platform that breaks the 'royal/traditional' cliché.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Vogue editorial with Fintech transparency.
Content is King: Every piece of jewellery tells a story.
Zoom In: Macro shots for texture.
Negative Space: Luxury is the absence of clutter.

headings.usage: Hero titles, Section headers, Product names

colors.theme_strategy: Light Mode Dominant (Gallery Feel) with 'Midnight' Dark Mode option

primary.name: Deep Emerald
primary.usage: Primary Actions, Brand Identity, Trust Indicators

secondary.name: Muted Gold
secondary.usage: Accents, Borders, Highlights (Use sparingly, never for text)

spacing.scale: Tailwind default but shifted up (p-4 -> p-8)

modes.marketing: Mode A: The Tetris Grid (Hero + Supporting + Filler)
modes.catalogue: Mode B: High Density Grid (Product Cards)
modes.profile: Mode A: Storytelling (Goldsmith photo + Bio + Work)

layout_strategies.alignment: Optical alignment. Center headings only for 'Grand' moments. Left align for reading.

buttons.primary: bg-emerald-900 text-white hover:bg-emerald-800 rounded-full px-8 py-3 tracking-wide transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: border border-emerald-900 text-emerald-900 hover:bg-emerald-50 rounded-full px-8 py-3 transition-all duration-300

cards.product: group relative bg-white border border-gray-100 hover:border-emerald-100 hover:shadow-hover transition-all duration-500 overflow-hidden
cards.feature: bg-gray-50 p-8 border-l-2 border-emerald-900 hover:bg-white transition-colors

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-b border-gray-300 focus:border-emerald-900 focus:ring-0 rounded-none px-0 py-3 placeholder:text-gray-400 transition-colors

navigation.style: Glassmorphism (backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80) sticky top-0 z-50 border-b border-gray-100

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on solid backgrounds to prevent 'digital flatness'.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Used for 'AI Assistant' chat window and 'Live Price' ticker.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a 'Modern Luxury' app. It should feel expensive but accessible. Avoid 'Royal' clichés (crowns, heavy purples). Think 'Vogue' meets 'Fintech'.
critical_rules: DO NOT use gradients for text.
DO NOT use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Playfair Display'.
Ensure 'Live Price' ticker is visible but not intrusive (Fintech element).
The 'Price Breakdown' must be a clean, transparent table, not a hidden modal.

pages.landing: Hero must be immersive. Use the 'Model' image. Trust indicators (Goldsmith profile) should be prominent.
pages.catalogue: Clean grid. Filters on the left (desktop) or drawer (mobile). Focus on images.
pages.product: Split screen. Left: Sticky Image Gallery. Right: Details + Price Calculator + Order Intent.
pages.ai_assistant: Floating action button (bottom right) that expands into a glassmorphism chat window.

universal_guidelines.anti_slop: Avoid generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry. Use negative space.
universal_guidelines.interactions: All buttons must have hover states. Inputs must have focus states.
universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure text contrast is high (Charcoal on White).
universal_guidelines.testing: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
